top_reviews.title: Sleeves fitting
top_reviews.body: *Sleeves Doesn’t fit well kinda tight if your arms are on heavier side *34-36 B cup can buy large size it fits good on body *can be used as crop top and blouse * material wise just ok * Not worth the moneyRead more

*Sleeves Doesn’t fit well kinda tight if your arms are on heavier side
*34-36 B cup can buy large size it fits good on body
*can be used as crop top and blouse
* material wise just ok
* Not worth the money
